definitions: able to be discovered or found; findable

examples.text: the traces of his pen are readily discoverable on every page
there must be some discoverable patterns

shortDefinitions: able to be discovered or found

definitions: (of online content) tending or designed to be easily found by users via a search engine, within an application, or on a website

examples.text: the keywords appearing in the content are discoverable through search engines
your content needs to be easily discoverable and accessible to the tablet user

shortDefinitions: (of online content) easily found by users
